item.title: Set Animated Gif as Wallpaper
item.description: NOTE: Environment Ubuntu 20.04 Dependencies # Xwinwrap: 1sudo apt-get install xorg-dev build-essential libx11-dev x11proto-xext-dev libxrender-dev libxext-dev 2git clone https://github.com/ujjwal96/xwinwrap.git 3cd xwinwrap 4make 5sudo make install 6make clean Gifsicle: 1sudo apt install gifsicle The helper script # A helper script to setup animated .gif in dual monitors. 1#!/bin/bash 2# Uses xwinwrap to display given animated .gif in dual monitors. 3if [ $# -ne 1 ]; then 4 echo 1>&2 Usage: $0 image.
